metadata.name: In search of Gyanganj
metadata.description:
Gyanganj - In hindi, refers to an imaginary place of the 4th dimension, literally translation to "Kingdom of Knowledge" 

Sketched this piece of artwork from my memories and imaginations of a place that could exist, based on the stories recited to me by my father as a child.

Miko, along with her father Tashi and her dog, Rokko are out there on the hike, where they come across Gyanganj.
